quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
author: Martin Fowler

quote: Premature optimization is the root of all evil.
author: Donald Knuth

quote: Before software can be reusable, it first has to be usable.
author: Ralph Johnson

quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
author: Cory House

quote: The best way to get a project done faster is to start sooner.
author: Jim Highsmith

quote: You know what would make this better? If there was an app for it.
author: Gilfoyle

quote: Controlling complexity is the essence of computer programming.
author: Brian Kernighan

quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem.
author: Jack Sparrow

quote: The function of good software is to make the complex appear simple.
author: Grady Booch

quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
author: Yoda

quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
author: Sherlock Holmes

quote: If the product is good, it will sell itself.
author: Erlich Bachman

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
author: Harold Abelson

quote: “You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.” – Wayne Gretzky
author: Michael Scott

quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: You see, but you do not observe.
author: Sherlock Holmes

quote: Move fast and break things.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Sometimes I start a sentence and I don't even know where it's going. I just hope I find it along the way.
author: Michael Scott

quote: Sometimes it is the people no one imagines anything of who do the things that no one can imagine.
author: Alan Turing

quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
author: Edsger W. Dijkstra

quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
author: Uncle Ben

quote: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
author: Kent Beck

quote: Good code is its own best documentation.
author: Steve McConnell

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I can do this all day.
author: Steve Rogers
